DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/workers/sc.description: Delete your worker. This call has no response body on a successful delete.

schema.description: Identifier.
Name of the script, used in URLs and route configuration.

parameters.description: If set to true, delete will not be stopped by associated service binding, durable object, or other binding. Any of these associated bindings/durable objects will be deleted along with the script.
parameters.name: force

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.
Whether the API call was successful.

DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/workers/sc.description: Remove a secret from a script.

schema.description: Identifier.
Name of the script, used in URLs and route configuration.
A JavaScript variable name for the secret binding.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.
Whether the API call was successful.

DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/workers/sc.description: Disable all workers.dev subdomains for a Worker.

schema.description: Identifier.
Name of the script, used in URLs and route configuration.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

enabled.description: Whether the Worker is available on the workers.dev subdomain.

previews_enabled.description: Whether the Worker's Preview URLs are available on the workers.dev subdomain.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/workers/scrip.description: Fetch a list of uploaded workers.

schema.description: Identifier.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

etag.description: Hashed script content, can be used in a If-None-Match header when updating.

id.description: The id of the script in the Workers system. Usually the script name.

logpush.description: Whether Logpush is turned on for the Worker.

modified_on.description: When the script was last modified.

last_analyzed_at.description: The last time the script was analyzed for [Smart Placement](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/configuration/smart-placement).

allOf.description: Enables [Smart Placement](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/configuration/smart-placement).
Status of [Smart Placement](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/configuration/smart-placement).

tail_consumers.description: List of Workers that will consume logs from the attached Worker.

items.description: A reference to a script that will consume logs from the attached Worker.

environment.description: Optional environment if the Worker utilizes one.

namespace.description: Optional dispatch namespace the script belongs to.

service.description: Name of Worker that is to be the consumer.

usage_model.description: Usage model for the Worker invocations.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/workers/scrip.description: Fetch raw script content for your worker. Note this is the original script content, not JSON encoded.

schema.description: Identifier.
Name of the script, used in URLs and route configuration.

additionalProperties.description: Modules used by the Worker, including JavaScript files and source maps.

200.description: Worker successfully downloaded. Returns script content as a multipart form, with no metadata part and no JSON encoding applied.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

schema.description: Identifier.
Name of the script, used in URLs and route configuration.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

allOf.description: Date indicating targeted support in the Workers runtime. Backwards incompatible fixes to the runtime following this date will not affect this Worker.
Flags that enable or disable certain features in the Workers runtime. Used to enable upcoming features or opt in or out of specific changes not included in a `compatibility_date`.

items.description: Flag that enables or disables a specific feature in the Workers runtime.

limits.description: Limits to apply for this Worker.

cpu_ms.description: The amount of CPU time this Worker can use in milliseconds.

allOf.description: Whether Logpush is turned on for the Worker.

migrations.description: Migrations to apply for Durable Objects associated with this Worker.

new_tag.description: Tag to set as the latest migration tag.

old_tag.description: Tag used to verify against the latest migration tag for this Worker. If they don't match, the upload is rejected.

deleted_classes.description: A list of classes to delete Durable Object namespaces from.

new_classes.description: A list of classes to create Durable Object namespaces from.

new_sqlite_classes.description: A list of classes to create Durable Object namespaces with SQLite from.

renamed_classes.description: A list of classes with Durable Object namespaces that were renamed.

transferred_classes.description: A list of transfers for Durable Object namespaces from a different Worker and class to a class defined in this Worker.

oneOf.description: A single set of migrations to apply.

new_tag.description: Tag to set as the latest migration tag.

old_tag.description: Tag used to verify against the latest migration tag for this Worker. If they don't match, the upload is rejected.

new_classes.description: A list of classes to create Durable Object namespaces from.

new_sqlite_classes.description: A list of classes to create Durable Object namespaces with SQLite from.

renamed_classes.description: A list of classes with Durable Object namespaces that were renamed.

transferred_classes.description: A list of transfers for Durable Object namespaces from a different Worker and class to a class defined in this Worker.

enabled.description: Whether observability is enabled for the Worker.

head_sampling_rate.description: The sampling rate for incoming requests. From 0 to 1 (1 = 100%, 0.1 = 10%). Default is 1.

POST /accounts/{account_id}/workers/asse.description: Upload assets ahead of creating a Worker version.  To learn more about the direct uploads of assets, see https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/static-assets/direct-upload/.

schema.description: Identifier.
Whether the file contents are base64-encoded. Must be `true`.

additionalProperties.description: Base-64 encoded contents of the file. The content type of the file should be included to ensure a valid "Content-Type" header is included in asset responses.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

jwt.description: A "completion" JWT which can be redeemed when creating a Worker version.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.
Whether the API call was successful.

POST /accounts/{account_id}/workers/scri.description: Start uploading a collection of assets for use in a Worker version. To learn more about the direct uploads of assets, see https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/static-assets/direct-upload/.

schema.description: Identifier.
Name of the script, used in URLs and route configuration.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

manifest.description: A manifest ([path]: {hash, size}) map of files to upload. As an example, `/blog/hello-world.html` would be a valid path key.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

buckets.description: The requests to make to upload assets.

items.description: The set of assets to include in each request while uploading.
The file hash to include in this bucket.

jwt.description: A JWT to use as authentication for uploading assets.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

buckets.description: The requests to make to upload assets.

items.description: The set of assets to include in each request while uploading.
The file hash to include in this bucket.

jwt.description: A JWT to use as authentication for uploading assets.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

4XX.description: Create Assets Upload Session response failure.

POST /accounts/{account_id}/workers/scri.description: Enable or disable the Worker on the workers.dev subdomain.

schema.description: Identifier.
Name of the script, used in URLs and route configuration.

enabled.description: Whether the Worker should be available on the workers.dev subdomain.

previews_enabled.description: Whether the Worker's Preview URLs should be available on the workers.dev subdomain.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

enabled.description: Whether the Worker is available on the workers.dev subdomain.

previews_enabled.description: Whether the Worker's Preview URLs are available on the workers.dev subdomain.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

PUT /accounts/{account_id}/workers/scrip.description: Upload a worker module. You can find more about the multipart metadata on our docs: https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/configuration/multipart-upload-metadata/.

schema.description: Identifier.
Name of the script, used in URLs and route configuration.
Raw javascript content comprising a Worker. Must be in service worker syntax.

additionalProperties.description:
A module comprising a Worker script, often a javascript file. Multiple modules may be provided as separate named parts, but at least one module must be present and referenced in the metadata as `main_module` or `body_part` by part name.
Possible Content-Type(s) are: `application/javascript+module`, `text/javascript+module`, `application/javascript`, `text/javascript`, `application/wasm`, `text/plain`, `application/octet-stream`, `application/source-map`.

metadata.description: JSON encoded metadata about the uploaded parts and Worker configuration.

assets.description: Configuration for assets within a Worker.

config.description: Configuration for assets within a Worker.

_headers.description: The contents of a _headers file (used to attach custom headers on asset responses).

_redirects.description: The contents of a _redirects file (used to apply redirects or proxy paths ahead of asset serving).

html_handling.description: Determines the redirects and rewrites of requests for HTML content.

not_found_handling.description: Determines the response when a request does not match a static asset, and there is no Worker script.

run_worker_first.description: Contains a list path rules to control routing to either the Worker or assets. Glob (*) and negative (!) rules are supported. Rules must start with either '/' or '!/'. At least one non-negative rule must be provided, and negative rules have higher precedence than non-negative rules.

jwt.description: Token provided upon successful upload of all files from a registered manifest.

compatibility_date.description: Date indicating targeted support in the Workers runtime. Backwards incompatible fixes to the runtime following this date will not affect this Worker.

compatibility_flags.description: Flags that enable or disable certain features in the Workers runtime. Used to enable upcoming features or opt in or out of specific changes not included in a `compatibility_date`.

keep_assets.description: Retain assets which exist for a previously uploaded Worker version; used in lieu of providing a completion token.

keep_bindings.description: List of binding types to keep from previous_upload.

logpush.description: Whether Logpush is turned on for the Worker.

main_module.description: Name of the part in the multipart request that contains the main module (e.g. the file exporting a `fetch` handler). Indicates a `module syntax` Worker.

Status of [Smart Placement](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/configuration/smart-placement).

items.description: A reference to a script that will consume logs from the attached Worker.

environment.description: Optional environment if the Worker utilizes one.

namespace.description: Optional dispatch namespace the script belongs to.

service.description: Name of Worker that is to be the consumer.

usage_model.description: Usage model for the Worker invocations.

x-cfLinkErrors.10014: Internal error while attempting authorization checks
x-cfLinkErrors.10015: The current account is not authorized to use workers

x-cfLinkErrors.10021: Script content failed validation checks, but was otherwise parseable

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

PUT /accounts/{account_id}/workers/scrip.description: Put script content without touching config or metadata.

schema.description: Identifier.
Name of the script, used in URLs and route configuration.

parameters.description: The multipart name of a script upload part containing script content in service worker format. Alternative to including in a metadata part.
parameters.name: CF-WORKER-BODY-PART

parameters.description: The multipart name of a script upload part containing script content in es module format. Alternative to including in a metadata part.
parameters.name: CF-WORKER-MAIN-MODULE-PART

additionalProperties.description:
A module comprising a Worker script, often a javascript file. Multiple modules may be provided as separate named parts, but at least one module must be present. This should be referenced either in the metadata as `main_module` (esm)/`body_part` (service worker) or as a header `CF-WORKER-MAIN-MODULE-PART` (esm) /`CF-WORKER-BODY-PART` (service worker) by part name.
Possible Content-Type(s) are: `application/javascript+module`, `text/javascript+module`, `application/javascript`, `text/javascript`, `application/wasm`, `text/plain`, `application/octet-stream`, `application/source-map`.

metadata.description: JSON encoded metadata about the uploaded parts and Worker configuration.

body_part.description: Name of the part in the multipart request that contains the script (e.g. the file adding a listener to the `fetch` event). Indicates a `service worker syntax` Worker.

main_module.description: Name of the part in the multipart request that contains the main module (e.g. the file exporting a `fetch` handler). Indicates a `module syntax` Worker.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

etag.description: Hashed script content, can be used in a If-None-Match header when updating.

id.description: The id of the script in the Workers system. Usually the script name.

logpush.description: Whether Logpush is turned on for the Worker.

modified_on.description: When the script was last modified.

last_analyzed_at.description: The last time the script was analyzed for [Smart Placement](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/configuration/smart-placement).

allOf.description: Enables [Smart Placement](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/configuration/smart-placement).
Status of [Smart Placement](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/configuration/smart-placement).

tail_consumers.description: List of Workers that will consume logs from the attached Worker.

items.description: A reference to a script that will consume logs from the attached Worker.

environment.description: Optional environment if the Worker utilizes one.

namespace.description: Optional dispatch namespace the script belongs to.

service.description: Name of Worker that is to be the consumer.

usage_model.description: Usage model for the Worker invocations.

x-cfLinkErrors.10015: The current account is not authorized to use workers
x-cfLinkErrors.10018: Attempted to update a script where the e-tag does not match
x-cfLinkErrors.10021: Script content failed validation checks, but was otherwise parseable

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

PUT /accounts/{account_id}/workers/scrip.description: Add a secret to a script.

schema.description: Identifier.
Name of the script, used in URLs and route configuration.
A secret value accessible through a binding.

name.description: A JavaScript variable name for the binding.

type.description: The kind of resource that the binding provides.

key_base64.description: Base64-encoded key data. Required if `format` is "raw", "pkcs8", or "spki".

key_jwk.description: Key data in [JSON Web Key](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/SubtleCrypto/importKey#json_web_key) format. Required if `format` is "jwk".

name.description: A JavaScript variable name for the binding.

type.description: The kind of resource that the binding provides.
